metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000215 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Dave Gamble cJSON version 1.7.6 and earlier contains a CWE-772vulnerability in cJSON library that can result in Denial of Service (DoS).This attack appear to be exploitable via If the attacker can force the datato be printed and the system is in low memory it can force a leak ofmemory. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 1.7.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcjson1 - 1.7.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cjson package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.15-1').
